metadata.Title: CVE-2023-29531 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - negligible
metadata.Description: An attacker could have caused an out of bounds memory access using WebGLAPIs, leading to memory corruption and a potentially exploitable crash.*This bug only affects Firefox and Thunderbird for macOS. Other operatingsystems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 112, FirefoxESR < 102.10, and Thunderbird < 102.10.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
